messages.message: We are sorry to tell that the system is out of order for the moment.
WORDFORM is not found in our lexicon. Could it be a typo?
WORDFORM should have initial capital letter?
WORDFORM has a typo?
WORDFORM var okänd. Kan det vara ett stavfel?
WORDFORM är felaktig.
Your answer should be a full sentence, and must always contain a finite verb. Could there be a typo in your verbform?
Answer with the same verb as in the question.
You must use the given verb.
You must use the given noun.
You must use the given adjective.
You must use the given pronoun.
You must use the given numeral.
You must use the given postposition.
WORDFORM måste vara i komitativ (kasus som uttrycker "med": haamriga (med hammare), poistega (tillsammans med pojkarna)).
WORDFORM måste vara i inessiv.
Några verb, f.ex. minema, kräver illative. Ex. 'Ma lähen teatrisse.'
WORDFORM should be in plural when you are talking about several items.
WORDFORM should be in singular when you are talking about only one item.
Your answer should contain a numeral in singular.
Your answer should contain a numeral in plural.
Your answer should contain a numeral in locative.
Your answer should contain a collective numeral or numeral in locative.
Är du säker på att du har använt rätt kasus?
The vehicle should be in comitative, e.g. autoga.
Ordet WORDFORM måste vara i adessiv. (Kasus som uttrycker "på": laual (på bordet), sillal (på bron), reedel (på fredag). Kasusändelsen för adessiv är '-l'.
In front of a postposition the nominal should be in genitive.
Är verbet WORDFORM i rätt form?
Kom ihåg kongruens mellan subjekt och verb.
Tänk på verbens WORDFORM tid: pratar vi om nutid eller dåtid?
Det finns ett kongruensfel i meningen.
